title: Alaska Public Lands: Donate
body: Donate         Schoolchildren gather for wildlife etiquette activities nps  Thank you for your interest in donating to the Alaska Public Lands Information Center in Anchorage. Your donation will go directly to education programs for local schoolchildren and interpretation programs for visitors from around the globe.  If you would like to donate, please mail your check to:  Director Alaska Public Lands Information Center 605 West 4th Avenue, Suite 105 Anchorage, AK 99501  If you have questions concerning donations, please contact us.
